QuestData.Title: Desconstruction
QuestData.Description: The Kirin Tor constructs are primitive at best. Nevertheless, they pose a threat.$b$bGo to Violet Rise and dismantle Jaina's pitiful war machines. Show the Kirin Tor how easily they can be defeated!$b$bThis will be a message the Kirin Tor cannot easily ignore.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 3 Kirin Tor Constructs around Violet Rise.
